LanguageData.BionicLung.label: bionic lung
LanguageData.BionicLung.description: An advanced artificial lung. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological lung in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicKidney.label: bionic kidney
LanguageData.BionicKidney.description: An advanced artificial kidney. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological kidney in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicLiver.label: bionic liver
LanguageData.BionicLiver.description: An advanced artificial liver. A lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires bionic organs research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicFoot.label: bionic foot
LanguageData.BionicFoot.description: An advanced artificial foot. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological foot in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicToe.label: bionic toe
LanguageData.BionicToe.description: An advanced artificial toe. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological toe in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicShoulder.label: bionic shoulder
LanguageData.BionicShoulder.description: An advanced artificial shoulder. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological shoulder in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicHand.label: bionic hand
LanguageData.BionicHand.description: An advanced artificial hand. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological hand in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.BionicFinger.label: bionic finger
LanguageData.BionicFinger.description: An advanced artificial finger. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological finger in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

LanguageData.BionicJaw.description: An advanced artificial jaw. With its biogel nerve-link and lattice-dust healing system, it is better than a biological jaw in almost every way. Requires bionics research to install it.

LanguageData.BionicClavicle.description: An advanced artificial clavicle. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.

LanguageData.BionicSternum.description: An advanced artificial sternum. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage. Requires bionic bones research to install it.
